author: Daniel S
comment: This app almost has all i wanted .  but just wish it would show how many notifications i have waiting to view.. will that be implimented soon? and maybe also no image in ambient?  thank you!

author: Nick Kosmides
comment: I like this watch face but the tiny text only gets worse in Ambient mode. And the background becomes a gross distortion of black and white. I would have preferred the background disappeared completely in Ambient. A solid black background with clear and legible numbers and letters. Asus ZenWatch 2.

author: ephyoosecay
comment: Paid for premium to support the mustache one by this dev, turned out to love this one just as much! Going to go buy the third face to support this team. Best part is they don't need any unreasonable permissions!

author: shahzaman anwer
comment: Need more options to control the fonts and to make it bold or bigger.
title: Nice watch

author: Liam Phelps
comment: Excellent. How had I not seen this watchface before
title: Brilliant.

author: Trina B.
comment: Only shows yesterday and today's calendars. And would be nice to have a month/day option instead of day/month. And, somehow totally froze up my Moto 360 1st gen and I had to reset it. Uninstalled.

reply.author: The Hoodie Studio
reply.content: Hi Trina, thank you for your feedback. Optional date display and more days in calendar display are good advices, I will think about it ! Can you tell me more about the freeze issue ? Did it happen when loading a picture ? Best regards :)

author: Jia Le
comment: The short notification cannot be turn off. Great to have function to adjust font size

reply.author: The Hoodie Studio
reply.content: Hi Jia, any update on this ? -- Hello Jia, thanks for your feedback. I just checked short notifications and I don't reproduce the issue. You can try by sending a notification to your watch (wear app - menu - test notification) then toggle short notif within halftime companion app :) --

title: Short notification card no work

author: Kenneth Barrera
comment: The weather part does not seem to want to function on my moto but everything else does.

reply.author: The Hoodie Studio
reply.content: Hi Kenneth, any update on this ? -- Hi Kenneth, thanks for your feedback. Do you mean weather is not displaying ? If yes, can you check if you have access to premium options within the phone app, and if you enabled/allowed at least once the GPS on your phone ? Keep me updated, best regards :) --

title: Pretty good

author: Steve Zanft
comment: Exactly what I've been after, battery, weather and agenda info at a glance, with more detail at a touch. Custom background is awesome. Although to be honest, I set the top panel to full transparency!
title: Brilliant!

author: Justin Stolzman
comment: Really like it! Any chance we'll have the ability to change the transparency for the tile in ambient mode eventually?

author: Alex
comment: I like it. The watch face looks good. I wish it was a bit more customisable though, I'd like to see options particularly for giving the weather a bigger focus and showing upcoming days. Perhaps some optional text on the bottom half?
title: Nice

author: Joshua Rolton
comment: I like how simple the face looks but would like so see some options if the thickness of the text and the size.  I have the g watch r and in ambient it would be nice to have the date and text bigger.  Other than that like your other face since the update keep it coming

reply.author: The Hoodie Studio
reply.content: Hi Joshua, I added a few text options in the last update (1.13). Please check it out :)

title: Really good start

author: Michael Pelton
comment: Great app but could use more options for customization like ambient timeout & font size (time area takes a lot of space yet the date you can hardly read).

reply.author: The Hoodie Studio
reply.content: Hi Michael, thanks for your feedback. I just released version 1.12 which includes an option for the ambient timeout (from 5 to 30 seconds). Please check it out :) EDIT : I added a few text options in the last update (1.13). Please check it out :)

title: Missing just that much

author: Sherry Corbett
comment: Really enjoy this watchface. I wish I could make the text for batteries and date a little larger. Would also like to be able to disable the seconds when the face is awake.

reply.author: The Hoodie Studio
reply.content: Hi Sherry, I added an option to grow the text for battery and date. I also added an option to disable the seconds. I hope you'll like it ! Please check it out in the last update (1.13) :)

title: I like it

author: Martin Burger
comment: Nice and clean watch face. Awesome support from developer.

author: Kyle McQ
comment: Really liked your mustache watch face so I figured I would buy this to support you. It would be nice to have analog on this one too. Keep up the good work!

reply.author: The Hoodie Studio
reply.content: Thanks for your support Kyle, it means a lot to me. I'm working on weather forecast, then I will see how I can display some analog. Thanks for your advice !

title: Pretty good
